Package ohos.security.permission

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.security.permission.Permission

  • public class Permission
extends Object
    Permission interface for developers.
    Since:
    3

    • Method Detail

      • canRequestPermissionFromRemote

        public static boolean canRequestPermissionFromRemote​(String permission,
                                                     String nodeId)
        Check whether the current application is allowed to request the specified sensitive permission on the remote device.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission name.
        nodeId - The remote device networkId, should not be null.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the permission can be requested; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • requestPermissionsFromRemote

        public static void requestPermissionsFromRemote​(String[] permissions,
                                                Permission.OnRequestPermissionsResult callback,
                                                String nodeId,
                                                String bundleName,
                                                int reasonResId)
        Request the specified sensitive permissions on specified remote device.

        Note: The sensitive permission request result is returned asynchronously through the interface in OnRequestPermissionsResult.

        Parameters:
        permissions - The sensitive permission list on the remote device that the user applies for.
        callback - The callback of the request operation, see OnRequestPermissionsResult.
        nodeId - The remote device networkId, should not be null.
        bundleName - The package name that request the permissions.
        reasonResId - The resource ID of the string for the reason for using the permissions.
        Since:
        4

      • verifyPermissionFromRemote

        public static int verifyPermissionFromRemote​(String permission,
                                             String nodeId,
                                             String appIdInfo)
        Verify if the given application has been granted permission with the given name to access the remote device.

        Note: This API is used only to check sensitive permissions. -1 will be returned when the API used to check non-sensitive permissions.

        Parameters:
        permission - The permission name which to be checked.
        nodeId - The networkId of the remote device, should not be null.
        appIdInfo - The information of the app which to be verified. It is a JSON string consisting of the UID and PID of the current application.This is a reference format: "{\"uid\":10888,\"pid\":555}".
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the permission is granted; returns -1 otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • verifySelfPermissionFromRemote

        public static int verifySelfPermissionFromRemote​(String permission,
                                                 String nodeId)
        Verify self whether has been granted permission with the given name to access the remote device.

        Note: This API is used only to check sensitive permissions. -1 will be returned when the API used to check non-sensitive permissions.

        Parameters:
        permission - The permission name which to be checked.
        nodeId - The networkId of the remote device, should not be null.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the permission is granted; returns -1 otherwise.
        Since:
        4
